I'm a PhD candidate at the Institue for Data, Systems, and Society at MIT. I do cool stuff. My boyfriend is pretty great. Sometimes, he helps with geeky stuff like making a website and is on a plane without a lorem/bacon ipsum generator so he needs some extra text to test layout. When that happens, this is the kind of paragraph he writes.

Thanks to Mark Caron for making the leaf icon available under Creative Commons.
